topic.title: RF Decoupling Capacitors on DLVR Input Power Planes

section.p:
High frequency decoupling capacitors on DLVR power plane (VCC_CORE & VCCSA) can help in DLVR noise reduction. Since there are system level dependencies for the RFI, in certain scenarios like a system with aggressive antenna placement to DLVR power plane or WWAN radio for example, it is recommended to have placeholders for decoupling capacitors.
The following table and figures show the recommended values and placement for the decoupling caps and example of layout implementation.
